Name: Negroni
Steps: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve

Name: Manhattan
Steps: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served straight up.

Name: Daquiri
Steps: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice
Shake well
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

Name: Sidecar
Steps: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice
Shake well
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass

Name: Margarita
Steps: Rub the rim of the glass with the lime slice to make the salt stick.
Shake the other ingredients with ice.
Carefully pour into the glass (Taking care not to dislodge any salt).
Garnish and serve over ice

Name: Mojito
Steps: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice.
Add rum, ice and top with soda water
Garnish with extra mint

Name: Sazerac
Steps: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice and set aside.
Stir the remaining ingrredients over ice and set it aside.
Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass.
Add the lemon peel for garnish

Name: Whiskey Sour
Steps: Shake with ice.
Strain into ice-filled old-fashioned glass to serve "on the rocks"

Name: Mint Julep
Steps: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water.
Fill the glass with cracked ice, add bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted.
Garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: French 75
Steps: Combine gin, syrup and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.
Shake vigorously and strain into an iced champagne glass.
Top up with Champagne.
Stir gently

Name: Old Fashioned (Bourbon)
Steps: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water
Muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.
Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Old Fashioned (Rye)
Steps: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water
Muddle until dissolved.
Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey.
Garnish with orange slice and a cherry.

Name: Martini
Steps: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes.
Stir well.
Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink or garnish with olives.

Name: Tequila Sunrise
Steps: Pour the tequila dnd orange juice into glass over ice.
Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom.
Do not stir.
Garnish and serve

Name: Tom Collins
Steps: Mix the gin, lemon juice and sugar syrup in a tall glass with ice.
Top up with soda water.
Garnish and serve
